txt.en: 'We've been having a lot of trouble with the local animals lately. If you want to help, talk to Provisioner Orgrin.'
'Have you seen the Jorthkyn? There is rumour that we dwarves and they are related.'
'Should anyone try to disrupt our efforts here, we will fall on them like a hammer on the anvil.'
'Our numbers are few, but we are equal to our task.'
